content.en: Lens optimization: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms, such as genetic algorithms and evolutionary strategies, to optimize the design of lenses. These algorithms are being used to address different research questions, such as improving lens convergence, eliminating aberrations, and optimizing lens geometry. By harnessing the power of these algorithms, scientists hope to enhance the performance and efficiency of lens systems in various applications.
content.da: Linseoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom genetiske algoritmer og evolutionære strategier, til at optimere designet af linser. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål, såsom forbedring af linsekonvergens, eliminering af aberrationer og optimering af linsegeometri. Ved at udnytte disse algoritmers kraft håber videnskabsfolk at kunne forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten af linsesystemer i forskellige anvendelser.
